summary: mesut ozil was in fine form as germany beat georgia 2-0 in euro 2016 qualifier on sunday . ozil impressed on international duty as germany beat gerogia 2-0 in a euro 2016 qualifier on sunday . ozil was said to have been spotted in a berlin nightclub after missing the gunners ' 2-1 win at st james ' park .
aspect: 1. Ozil enjoys home comforts with his dog after international break. 2. World Cup winner shines in Euro 2016 qualifier, 3. Ozil adapts to English football, prefers playing in many matches.
explain: 1. Ozil returns to Germany after international games and spends quality time with his dog. 2. Ozil performs exceptionally well in Euro 2016 qualifier to help Germany win 2-0 against Georgia. 3. Ozil has adapted to the English football system and prefers playing in multiple matches.
